entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 2:25 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -20.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
